derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from Spanish, literally vigilant'

entry.tran: （自发组成的）治安维持会会员;义务警察
entry.def: Vigilantes are people who organize themselves into an unofficial group to protect their community and to catch and punish criminals.

example.ex: The vigilantes dragged the men out.
example.tran: 治安员们把那些人揪了出来。
